text: Will be answering #MentalHealth questions with @Mark_Butler_MP at @GetUp’s Mental Health Forum. Watch it LIVE http://bit.ly/ln2U3f TeamJG
Kiongozi yeyote ni vyema akawa mfano wa kuigwa.Ifike mahali watu watamani kuishi kama wewe kwa uchapa kazi,tabia njema na mwenendo.
Proud to launch @MadrasatiJo Phase 4 in Mafraq. 400 schools so far! Touched by eagerness of students & teachers to improve their schools.
Great conversation with students and teachers over #Mansaf afterwards. #JO http://yfrog.com/h2cmhqpj
Productive day sharing ideas with communities in tackling community concerns in Greytown and Estcourt. Working together we are doing more!
Hello my dear and beloved Comrades! Again I send my word of thanks for so many messages of encouragement. Here I am in Battle
The Great MissionViviendaVenezuela continues galloping! The updated Scientific Register reaches 202.123 families! To charge then!
@ eury03 Hello Eury. It has been a serious knee injury. But we keep going. Greetings for my beloved Panama.
@CFKArgentina! Congratulations my dear Cristina, for that great oil field discovered! Argentina to OPEC! Bravo!!
@LisbethNormann Congratulations with the day, it is well deserved. Good nurses are essential for good health and care.
At 1300 I will open the Progressive Governance Conference, where social democrats from all over the world participate. See live at http://live.mittap.no # PG11
RT @JCdeJager: Budget deficit 2010 is 5.4%, total government debt 62.7% of GDP. Something better than expected. Indicates gentle recovery: h ...
To my dear nurses go an infinite recognition for their patriotic and humanitarian work of always. Day of the Nurse, Day of Life!
What a beautiful act for my Nurses! I have enjoyed it intensely. What an example of conscience and dignity! Thanks for your love. I will cure!
@ Lacomandanta1 Hello Comandanta! Leave them with their hatred that devours them inside. Let's continue building with this love that we Descend. We will come back !!
@ josuma778406 Hello friend José! Min. Tarek please urgently attend this case. Come on!!
The Ministerial Summit of Petrocaribe was installed! That is the role of Leadership that the Homeland of Bolívar must continue assuming!
@magalysbp Hello friend Magaly. Good Min. Tarek: let's give an answer! Find ways to support with credit!
Tremendous effort of our Psuv! I congratulate you, comrades, for the installation of the Municipal Political and Police Teams. ALaCarga
@kelvincandanga Hello, Kelvin. We will call you to help you Comrade. Come on Tarek!
I must report synovial fluid leak left knee: "Moderately favorable, pain decreases, inflammation is maintained"
I keep reporting about injury. Forecast: "EXPECTANT". Medical discussion about possible need for Arthroscopy is maintained. We'll see!!
#MentalHealth patients will get better support with the #Budget's $2.2 billion mental health package http://bit.ly/jNJuiE JG
Have been to Creswick & Clunes to talk with Vics hit by floods. It's Clunes Booktown  event this weekend. 2nd hand books for every one! JG
@TheMurphstar I will be there to watch the game against Richmond. Go Dogs! JG
I'm off to PE, the friendly city, will spend the whole day with the friendly people of ibhayi elembathwa ngabalaziyo!
In view of the absence of @Minpres, @MaximeVerhagen and the oldest minister in age Opstelten, Minister Rosenthal chairs the Council of Ministers today.
The press conference of Minister Rosenthal after the Council of Ministers can be followed live here from 1.30 pm: http://is.gd/gKpua
Boys and girls from our National Security University: go to the street next to the town! We are with you!
Long live our Bolivarian National Police! It is the Police of the future! It is the Humanist Police for Socialism! Let's go guys!
I welcome the installation of the Presidential Commission for disarmament! I wish you good luck in your duties. We are going to disarm then! To peace!
See how much our Agroindustrial Complex "Abreu e Lima" has advanced in the Mesa de Guanipa! Thanks Brazil! Congratulate Your Workers!
How much emotion I feel to see that Battalion of big tractors of Belarus, now in the Table of Guanipa! Let the planting begin then!
The GranMisiónAgroVenezuela advances! The Great MissionViviendaVenezuela advances! Elijah, those two Great Missions now we must cross them! Come on!!
What words so full of strength and wisdom those of my comrades AgroVenezolanos and AgroVenezolanas! How much I love them!
I love the field! I love the peasants! What a beautiful black woman! And those lenses are left but of the last! I love you!
"The Interior Minister should stand at an equal distance from all sides in order to ensure the staging of honest and free elections"
"We are proud of Ziad Baroud's performance in the 2009 elections and it is an example we should follow"
@yazanstar no
@ A7lamShams !!! Everything is reasonable
@theinnercircle @Kalamennas Yes, the common border forces (Lebanese Army, Internal security forces, General security)
@ianbirrell. Not you either...no moral right! You give yourslf the right to abuse pple and judge them like you r the one to decide ...
@ianbirrell....and determine universally what s right or wrong and what shd be believed or not!!!  Wrong u r ...u have no such right ..
@ianbirrell. Ask Rwandans they will tell u I am not what u call me and I am sure they r not what you think they are...!
@ianbirrell. You have no basis for your comments and you dont kno what you r talking about me or Rw. I will only hold all that in contempt!
@ianbirrell. Africa-Rw- will need Africans to work in the lead n in concert with others globaLly who r genuine to put things right....
@ianbirrell. ....not the likes of you who just pretend ....!
@ianbirrell. You did not offer any explanation yourslf why you would refer to me as despotic n deluted...did u just want pple to believe it?
@ianbirrell. You were actually just insulting .....!
@ianbirrell. Why did u think I didnt have a right to my argument with the journalist of FT with whom I outlined that arg.???
@ianbirrell. Is that all u kno about Rw?  No need to explain to u anythg? Ask your own govt/leaders to explain to u those same things...
@ianbirrell  In Rw.we hold ourselves and each accountable indeed to a high level and even deal with criticism honestly,openly and fairly..!
@ianbirrell. No, the point underlined is that while some in UN,Human rights grps n media criticise,they r not without serious flaws..!
@ianbirrell....that have to be questioned more often that not ..and dont seem to like it! Probably you dont...yourslf!
@ianbirrell. It was those that were being referred to...!
Congratulations to our Heroic Bolivarian Armada on the occasion of the arrival in our waters of the 1st Oceanic Patrolman "Guaiquerí". Bravo!!
Our beloved Jessica Lopez bathed in gold at the gymnastics world championship in Moscow! Bravo Jessica! VivaLaJuventud Venezolana, the GeneraciónDeOro!
Brother Lugo, I join the joy of the Paraguayan people, heir of the Guarani blood, who today writes the way of his true INDEPENDENCE
Getting ready for #Siyanqoba. Join me at FNB Stadium in Johannesburg today! Or watch us live on SABC2 from 10am!
When you don't stand by the anti-graft posters hanging on your office walls,then your efforts to fight it will be interpreted as ridiculous.
All government officials should bear in mind that whatever is troubling our people is within our means.Inform and engage the people.
We are determined to protect our borders and sovereignty - we are determined to defend our borders and our sovereignty http://fb.me/VJZU6Smz
@esnaya Bravo Esther! I send you my very meaningful greeting and my commitment to struggle and victory. Hugs to your people! Happy Sunday!
@ reyvas12. Hello my friend. Well my rest you know is very relative. I want to help you. I commission Tarek El Aisami to contact you. Come on Tarek!
@ KATALINA312. Thanks, Maria Belen! Sunday hugs the whole family!
@ RosaT5. Hello rosa. This is very urgent Tarek. The Min. Sader that is in charge already! They report me!
@Reinaldogo Hello Reinaldo. What happened to this case, Tarek? Let's help!!
Pr. Sleiman condemned Israel's crimes against civilians in South Lebanon, the Golan and Palestine and called on the UN and UNIFIL to act
@paulhird9. Some 1 will get in touch sure! Sounds more interesting than ...
Thank God for everything. Our Lord is kind. Thank you for all your invitations. God willing he will make peace. God preserves your loved ones.
@kuaarekaha What a Paraguayan friend. Go for a hug of 200 years of Independence! Live the Youth and the Guaraní People !!
@CristianAcunia Our Fatherland Great. Cristian, this one of Bolívar, of SanMartín, of Perón, yours, that of our children! VivaLaArgentina !!
@ Adrianmetal86. My revolutionary greeting for you and for all that heroic Ecuadorian people, Alfarista and Bolivarian! We will win Adrian!

Visiting #Tamworth today. Cities like this are essential to our economy & identity. That's why we're investing in them http://bit.ly/m8r8hP

I have just visited IEC HQ centre. I'm satisfied with preparations and I would like to congratulate the IEC's officials for a good job!

We reached the million and a half of Candangueros and Candangueras! Thank you Tania for the information. Let's go ahead! Let's continue winning!
Making history today launching the #NBN for the first time on mainland Australia. Watch it LIVE in Armidale here http://bit.ly/lU9N1E
Well, the firm growth of our economy began again! Come on, let's push all and all! In Vanguard, The Workers! We will win!
Today, on Walter Sisulu's birthday, go out in your millions and vote for a better life for all! #SApolls #LGE2011
#SApolls I will vote in Nkandla at 11am. Always a liberating experience! #LGE2011
Congratulations to all for a peaceful election campaign nationwide. Our democracy is maturing in only 17 years.
@rakeshrajani thank you for the idea.It's worthy working on.
Mshikamano na ushirikiano ni vigezo vikuu kwa timu yoyote yenye nia ya kutekeleza majukumu yake kwa uadilifu,uaminifu na ufanisi.
How nice the graduation ceremony of the 1st promotion of Troop Officers! The Military Revolution advances! Soldiers of the TownYParaElPueblo !!
Really hear that the GranMisiónViviendaVenezuela has like crazy the analysts of the capitalist and bourgeois opposition! What things!
@ Ivett2600 I answer you, Ivett, from my heart! Hugs to your parents and siblings. May God always accompany you!
Here I am meeting with my comrade Erika Farías. I have appointed my Minister of the Presidency. I ask for her support! Welcome!
I just spoke with my dear Teresita Maniglia. I bring her back to me as head of the Miraflores Press. Let's support it! Welcome Teresita!
Epa, the rains come in earnest. I worry all of you, my fellow countrymen. Let's be very careful. And all the government deployed. Come on!!
I have ordered Min. Tarek El Aisami and the Commander of the Bolivarian Guard to set up in Táchira to command the emergency actions
